dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 5602 : To amend title 31, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to include all funds when issuing certain geographic targeting orders, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to include all funds when issuing certain geographic targeting orders, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: Section 5326 of title 31, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading of such section, by striking coin and currency;

subparagraph.text: by striking subtitle and and inserting subtitle or to; and

in paragraph (1)(A), by striking United States coins or currency (or such other monetary instruments as the Secretary may describe in such order) and inserting funds (as the Secretary may describe in such order),; and
in paragraph (1)(A), by striking coins or currency (or monetary instruments) and inserting funds; and

in paragraph (2), by striking coins or currency (or such other monetary instruments as the Secretary may describe in the regulation or order) and inserting funds (as the Secretary may describe in the regulation or order).

subsection.text: The table of contents for chapter 53 of title 31, United States Code, is amended in the item relating to section 5326 by striking coin and currency.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 11, 2016.
